com.paypal.selion.platform.html

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.html.AbstractElement
      • com.paypal.selion.platform.html.Label
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Hoverable

    public class Label
extends AbstractElement
    This class is the web Text wrapper.

    It is mainly to verify the Text on the web page.

      • Label

        public Label(String locator,
     String controlName)
        Use this constructor to override default controlName for logging purposes. Default controlName would be the element locator.
        Parameters:
        locator - - A String that represents the means to locate this element (could be id/name/xpath/css locator).
        controlName - the control name used for logging

      • Label

        public Label(ParentTraits parent,
     String locator)
        Use this constructor to create a Label contained within a parent.
        Parameters:
        parent - - A ParentTraits object that represents the parent element for this element.
        locator - - A String that represents the means to locate this element (could be id/name/xpath/css locator).

      • Label

        public Label(String locator,
     String controlName,
     ParentTraits parent)
        Use this constructor to create a Label contained within a parent. This constructor will also override default controlName for logging purposes. Default controlName would be the element locator.
        Parameters:
        locator - - A String that represents the means to locate this element (could be id/name/xpath/css locator).
        controlName - the control name used for logging
        parent - - A ParentTraits object that represents the parent element for this element.

    • Method Detail

      • isTextPresent

        public boolean isTextPresent(String pattern)
        It is to check whether the element's text matches with the specified pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - regular expression
        Returns:
        boolean true - the element's text matches with the pattern.
        false the element's text doesn't match with the pattern.
